article_title: IDF says three hostages killed in friendly fire.
sentence: IDF  says  three  hostages  killed  in  friendly  fire.

article_title: IDF says three hostages killed in friendly fire.
sentence: Israel's  army  says  troops  killed  three  hostages  after  mistaking  them  for  a  'threat',  Israeli  military  spokesperson  Daniel  Hagari  says.
